title: Commission Directive 80/590/EEC of 9 June 1980 determining the symbol that may accompany materials and articles intended to come into contact with foodstuffs
header:
COMMISSION DIRECTIVE  of 9 June 1980  determining the symbol that may accompany materials and articles intended to come into contact with foodstuffs  (80/590/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The symbol referred to in the last indent of Article 7 (1) (a) of Directive 76/893/EEC shall be that reproduced in the Annex hereto.
The Member States shall take the measures necessary to authorize with effect from 1 January 1981 the use of the symbol referred to in Article 1.
This Directive is addressed to the Member States.
